choose.when: INSERT INTO DM ( seq, room, sender, receiver, contents, send_dt, read_Dt, read_chk ) VALUES ( #{seq}, 1, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{readChk} )
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO DM ( seq, room, sender, receiver, contents, send_dt, read_Dt, read_chk ) VALUES ( #{seq}, 1, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{readChk} )

mapper.select: SELECT seq, room, sender, receiver, contents, TO_CHAR(send_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sendDt, TO_CHAR(read_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS readDt, read_chk FROM dm WHERE (seq, room) IN (SELECT MAX(seq), room FROM dm GROUP BY room) AND (sender = #{sender} OR reciever = #{receiver}) ORDER BY seq DESC

SELECT m.seq , m.room , sender , receiver , sender.name as senderName , receiver.name as receiverName , m.contents , TO_CHAR(m.send_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sendDT , TO_CHAR(m.read_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sendDT , m.read_chk AS readChk FROM dm m LEFT OUTER JOIN users sender ON m.sender = sender.email LEFT OUTER JOIN users receiver ON m.receiver = receiver.email WHERE m.sender = #{sender} AND m.receiver = #{receiver} ORDER BY seq

SELECT receiver.email AS receiver, receiver.name AS receiverName, COUNT(m.read_chk) AS readChk FROM dm m LEFT JOIN users receiver ON m.receiver = receiver.email GROUP BY receiver.email, receiver.name ORDER BY receiver.name
